PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-04722017-05-05,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectHon. Malcom H. Rowe ** REMOVAL ALLOWANCE **
PrecisOrder authorizing reimbursement to the Hon. MALCOLM H. ROWE, a Puisne Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada, for the period beginning on April 29, 2017 and ending on October 29, 2017, as an additional period during which the travelling and lodging costs, including amounts expended for meals, incurred before the establishment of the permanent new residence, or in order to visit from time to time members of the household still resident in the former residence.
AttachmentsAttachment
